description:
Employer Industry: Electronic Signature Solutions

Why Consider this Job Opportunity:
- Salary up to $235,025
- Opportunity for career advancement and growth within the organization
- Remote work opportunity
- Competitive bonus, equity, and benefits package
- Chance to work with a diverse and collaborative team
- Supportive work environment

What to Expect (Job Responsibilities):
- Manage a team of specialists to support partner ecosystem and onboarding
- Oversee partner application management and compliance checks
- Streamline operational processes and tools for partner support
- Analyze key operational KPIs to identify areas of improvement
- Develop and launch new policies and processes to support partner teams

What is Required (Qualifications):
- 8+ years of relevant experience in Customer / Partner Support or Partner Operations
- Experience managing a team of support representatives
- Proficiency with Salesforce Service Cloud
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills
- Ability to work in a matrix, enterprise organization

How to Stand Out (Preferred Qualifications):
- Experience with partner portals and engagement tools
- Ability to work with geographically distributed teams
- Strong stakeholder management and presentation skills
- Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
- Experience supporting Resale, Referral, and Services programs

#ElectronicSignatureSolutions #PartnerSupport #RemoteWorkOpportunity #CareerGrowth #CompetitivePay

At Talentify, we prioritize candidate privacy and champion equal-opportunity employment. Central to our mission is our partnership with companies that share this commitment. We aim to foster a fair, transparent, and secure hiring environment for all. If you encounter any employer not adhering to these principles, please bring it to our attention immediately. Talentify is not the EOR (Employer of Record) for this position. Our role in this specific opportunity is to connect outstanding candidates with a top-tier employer.
